main event: Pilots and civilians in the Maxwell AFB and Montgomery, Alabama area observed an unidentified fast-moving object at low altitudes.
interesting points: Around 14 T-33 pilots flying at 4,000 to 16,000 feet observed the unidentified object flying very fast at 3,000-2,000 feet altitude.
Civilians in the Montgomery area also observed the same or a similar unidentified object.
National Guard tower operators in Birmingham observed an unidentified object moving very fast from northeast to southwest.
The observers measured the object and estimated it to be approximately 35 feet in diameter.
The object was described as a round disc or ball-shaped, bright and luminous, moving extremely fast, and estimated to be above 50,000 feet in altitude.
witnesses: military pilots, civilians, and National Guard tower operators
